website_summaries.verdict: Style, performance, and an excellent feature set. You won’t find a better all-rounder for the money.
pros: Combination of lightweight aluminum frame and 750W motor enables rapid acceleration
48V, 13Ah battery and 7 Shimano gears gives efficient drive in all conditions
LCD display provides battery level, time, speed, and odometer readings
cons: Instructions are poor, and assembly is a little complex

customer_reviews.title: Great e-bike
customer_reviews.text: I received this bike in June of 2017. Its a great ebike and the price was good. I have been using it reliably for 5 months now. I had conversations with the manufacturer several times and he was great. You will not go wrong with this bike. Speed is good (reasonable for my 11 year old son) 20mph. Acceleration is fast. Battery lasts a long time. Use pedal assist or throttle alone. Everything you could want.
customer_reviews.author: michaelayoub

customer_reviews.title: Love it, so fun
customer_reviews.text: Love it, so fun. This bike will go about 18 - 19mph on flat ground with thumb throttle only I weight 200 lbs. The pedal assist is easy to use and adjust depending on your riding environment. When pedaling on flat it is relatively easy to hit 25mph (top speed the assets cuts out at 25mph) on the top pedal assist. Without any electric motor the bike still works well. I have taken it mountain biking and works great off road. I took a 30 mile road trip on flat ground most of the time on high pedal assist and I used up about 1/2 of the battery. Easy to put together. Highly recommend. 500W is plenty powerful.
customer_reviews.author: E. Boyce

customer_reviews.title: I assume that the computer went bad just like that
customer_reviews.text: This bike malfunctioned on the very first ride. The computer was reporting an electronic connection failure. After speaking with the costomer service who suggested that we remove and re-insert all the little connections (there were multiple up front) the error never went away. I assume that the computer went bad just like that. I did like the style and had hoped for a better experience. Packing the bike in the original carton was not the easiest task to undertake. If you do purchase this bike keep the carton and packing materials as you may need them to send it back as well. I was excited and could not wait for this to come in but immediately let down. :(
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Maureen Frazier

customer_reviews.title: What a bike!
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this bike for over a month and taking road trips from 5-8 miles with me doing as much pedaling as possible. I have clocked near a hundred total miles and the battery is still on 5 bars. It gives the boost needed for steep hills and whenever you just need a little break. The quality of the components is superior and equal or better to bikes costing a $1000 more. It was easy to put together although the instructions a little vague in some areas. I have been recommending it to my friends and family.
customer_reviews.author: ksckol

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: Love this bike! I can finally commute 30 miles to work in only 1 hour and 45 minutes! Normally, it would be a 3 hour ride on my old bike. And I'm not a dripping exhausted mess when I get there. It does take awhile to learn all the modes and features, but it is worth it. Get this bike!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks sharp
customer_reviews.text: I received this bike yesterday, it was very well packed and everything was included and in good shape. It took about 30 minutes to assemble and take my first test ride. Quick and smooth response at power level 1 and easily climbed the hill by my house. I couldn't find how to turn on the light so I left a question and had a reply the next morning. In case you need to know, hold down the Mode and up arrow for 3 seconds to turn on the light and computer backlight. Can't wait to give it its first workout. Looks nice and is very well built, lots of power.
customer_reviews.author: Fred D

customer_reviews.title: Great bike!
customer_reviews.text: So I just got the bike and only have 60 miles so far-- great bike, great power! The components are better than I expected. Super easy to assemble. Fast and the battery seems to last a very long time. On a 28 mile ride at level 2 pedal assist with many moderate hills the battery was still between 1/2 and 3/4 charge. Handles great, great brakes, shifting good. Great headlight too.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Malone

customer_reviews.title: Great e-bike,!
customer_reviews.text: My bike arrived in five days and was packed with great care! The bike was easy to put together ,and only took about 30 minutes. The best part is riding it !....very well built and very nice ride with lots of power ( I weigh 250 and it has no problems getting to top speed and has lots of power.....don’t think about it ....buy it...!...if it’s not out of stock....they sell fast!......Update!...Best customer service EVER!...had a small problem with our battery and DJ bikes got back to us right away and fixed the problem immediately!......I would recommend DJ bikes to anyone who is looking for a e-bike!....A+
customer_reviews.author: Beth

customer_reviews.title: DJ Bikes --Electric bike Review  750watts
customer_reviews.text: A good value at a reduced price --as it was used at the time of purchase through Amazon LLC Watch out for the stand over height. I'm five eight and I had to modify my seat pan and cut out an inch of the seat post down tube in order to have rider safety for this bike. And at 57 lbs with the battery --this bicycle is heavy --so you need a tow hitch type bike carrier to transport the bike to mountain trails. Or have a truck with at least a five foot bed. Good quality bike though-- and easy assembly Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Gary

customer_reviews.title: DJ mountain bike
customer_reviews.text: The geometry of the bike is a little off. When turning left/right the right/left foot can easily bump the wheel causing safety issue. Other than that the electric bike is great. I am updating my review to 4 stars. Daniel has been extra helpful. Moving my seat back has solved most of the problems turning. Overall I am quite satisfied with this electric bike.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Blake

customer_reviews.title: Awesome bike.
customer_reviews.text: This bike is AWESOME!! So far so good, if your willing to peddle I think the battery would last all day. I'm am glad I purchased this one.
customer_reviews.author: George Longobardi

customer_reviews.title: Great e-bike with large capacity battery for longer distances
customer_reviews.text: I love this bike! Have had it for a week and really enjoying it. The price art $1499 is very good. I’m really glad I went with a bike with a larger capacity battery (it is 630 watt hours, 13 amp hours) as I’ve gone for several rides between 25 and 30 miles (on pretty flat terrain) and had plenty of capacity. Looks great, was easy to assemble, is very sturdy, and coming from a non-electric bike you feel like Superman!
customer_reviews.author: mikesigadgets

customer_reviews.title: Commuter bike
customer_reviews.text: Like the bike however, got a flat at around 50 miles on the rear tire. When I went to change. The inner tube, discovered the wrong size inner tube was placed by the factory (too large) the inner tube was folded over on itself to make it fit which is what caused the flat. Replaced the inner tube with a puncture proof one (the correct size) and have not had any more issues with flats. I ride this bike every day to work and back and it makes the commute very easy.
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Smith

customer_reviews.title: THIS IS THE GREATEST BIKE
customer_reviews.text: JUST WANT EVERYONE TO KNOW THAT THIS BIKE IS THE BEST, I JUST WENT OVER 1000 MILES AND NO PROBLEMS AT ALL,IT HAS BROUGHT NOTHING PUT FUN TIMES A SMOOTH AND POWERFUL RIDE.
customer_reviews.author: William Hagan

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy with this Product
customer_reviews.text: This bike is awesome! I love saving so much money from fuel in the car and getting to enjoy riding around town. Seller is very helpful with any questions or concerns you might have. You can't go wrong with this one.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher K. Hoskins

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a finely crafted piece of machinery. Very intuitive and powerful. Has changed my life. Highly recommend. Customer service is unequaled as well.
customer_reviews.author: W. C. P

customer_reviews.title: With peddle assist at 1 only able to get 22 miles.
customer_reviews.text: Cons: Removing the seat to remove the battery. The voltage jumping around, not knowing how much power you have left. Pro's: Overall the bike is good and I like it.
customer_reviews.author: Joel

customer_reviews.title: Gives me freedom as I can no longer drive due to a vision problem
customer_reviews.text: I went ahead and had a bike shop put it together for me and it was worth protecting my investment. Also found that the slide bracket for the battery has to be absolutely perfect in order for the battery to hit the contacts and lock in place. Bike shop said this is a common problem with all the ebikes.
customer_reviews.author: Terry pfannenstiel

customer_reviews.title: Update on damaged part replacement.
customer_reviews.text: Update: Seller was very attentive to my damaged part on bike during shipping. Part sent out immediately and made sure I was satisfied. Very nice product. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.author: Nick

customer_reviews.title: Assembly and ease of use and maintenance are simple.
customer_reviews.text: It gets me outside and cranking the pedals around, going further and faster than walking. Goes up hills with aid of power.
customer_reviews.author: LB

customer_reviews.title: DJ mountain bike
customer_reviews.text: I like the bike a lot ,but I'm just getting use to it. I did find that the front wheel bearings were too tight, and had to readjust them. The real problem was that UPS delivered the bike to the wrong house and even faked the signature. The box was on a front porch of a unit down the block. The box was in full view of the street with the picture of a bike on it!
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: I do recommend this bike to anyone
customer_reviews.text: I was hesitant to make this purchase because there isn't much information out there about this bike. When I contacted the seller for information, he assured me that this was a well built bike and that I need not worry. The bike made it to me safely and well packaged. Putting it together was no problem. I don't have many miles on it yet because it's been raining a lot lately but it really is a well built bike. I do recommend this bike to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: R. lynch

customer_reviews.title: charges great. Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Fast. Ruises at 22mph. charges great. Very sturdy. Love this bike.
customer_reviews.author: art d

customer_reviews.title: Excited New Owner
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with this bike from assembly to riding it 38 miles already within 3 days. If you’ve never ridden an electric bike be careful at first while getting use to the power engagement after pedaling. Then rack up the fun miles!
customer_reviews.author: Gary Deel

customer_reviews.title: Great Bike
customer_reviews.text: The box showed up partially open and missing parts(UPS). Contacted the the seller and Daniel with DJ Bikes got back to me on a holiday and promptly sent the missing items. So far it's an awesome bike with terrific customer service from DJ Bikes.
customer_reviews.author: Jason T.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent battery life and good disc brakes.Low end power is awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I like this bike.I used to build mopeds but this bike makes that a thing of the past.If you live in the inner city,you can keep it in your APT.It is not heavy.The moped weighed 130lbs.This bike is light and fast.Easily half of the moped weight.
customer_reviews.author: Guy in 410

customer_reviews.title: Great bike
customer_reviews.text: I use my bike to commute to and from work every day for a total of 15 miles. Good power and stability.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Invest in Yourself
customer_reviews.text: This is the Absolute BEST Investment I’ve made to myself.i am at 760 miles so far.!!!! Thank you DJ Bikes ! And Thank You Daniel
customer_reviews.author: Chris Primmer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Bike
customer_reviews.text: My uncle is Complelely satisfied with the purchase of my DJ Mountain Bike.
customer_reviews.author: Wildcat21

customer_reviews.title: Nice bike
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice bike with a powerful motor, long-lasting battery, and good components. The seat post lacks an inline shock absorber, but this change was made because the old version, with shock absorber, was two inches taller, which made the seat too high for some people. The old version gives the bike full suspension, which the seller offered me to address issues with my lower back.
customer_reviews.author: Kaben Nanlohy

customer_reviews.title: Not what you expect. Stopped working after 30 minutes.
customer_reviews.text: There were a couple of initial issues and questions but the excellent customer service by Daniel solved them immediately.
customer_reviews.author: TRUMP2020

product_meta.title: DJ Mountain Bike 750W 48V 13Ah Power Electric Bicycle, Matte Black, LED Bike Light, Fork Suspension and Shimano Gear,
product_meta.description:
DJ Mountain Bike is an Amazon's Choice awarded electric bike built with high-quality mainstream components. 
The bike is powerful, affordable, durable, quiet, clean looking, easy to use and can bring you tons of fun! 
This performs perfectly through the city or on light off-road trails with an integrated front headlight and suspension to absorb shocks. 
Whether you are a commuter, senior, casual rider or sports fan, this is the bike built for everyone. 
The powerful 48V LG battery can be dismounted and charged anywhere on the go. The charger has a safety design to prevent over-charged. 
Enjoy scenery without sweating while saving money is the best combination. You can get them all on this zero-emission DJ Bikes. 
This is the best value buy in the range of 750W & 48V ebikes. 



Specifications

 *  Motor: Bafang Brushless 750W motor, 48V DC
 *  Battery: LG lithium 48V 13Ah dismountable with key lock 
 * Frame: Aluminum frame
 *  Brakes: Tektro Disc 
 *  Suspension: Mozo suspension fork system 
 * User Control: King Meter LCD
 * Tires: CST all-purpose 26”x 1.95” 
 * Rims: Heavy duty alloy rims 26” (66 cm) 
 * Seat: Extra comfortable cushion saddle 
 * Rear Cassette: Shimano 7 Gears
 * Weight: 57 lb. (26 kg) 
 *  Power Assisted Speed: Legal speed limit 20 mph (32 km/h) 



Why DJ Bikes?

 * We offer competitive pricing for the same or similar products.
 * We offer free shipping & fast shipping to US and Canada.
 * Our bicycles are durable and serviceable to any repair shop.
 * We offer 1 year warranty. Quality is endorsed.



You will not find a better deal on a high-performance low-cost ebike anywhere.
